price: A to su oni čija je kazna prokletstvo od Allaha i meleka i svih ljudi!
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ أَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ulāika jazāuhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
